drupalNodeEvent.title: Representations of Uyghurs in Chinese Cinema

field_description.processed: Vanessa Frangville will give a historical overview of the context of film production in Xinjiang from the 1950s and moves to the 1990s when the film industry in China underwent major economic and structural transformations. The webinar will examine a selection of films produced between 1996 and 2020 and seek to provide an assessment of how representations of Uyghurs in Chinese films have evolved and changed according to the Stateâ€™s agenda.
